title: North Coast Naturopathic Medicine
cleaned_text: Where Wellness Comes Naturally North Coast Naturopathic Medicine utilizes a wide range of therapeutics which stimulate your body's innate ability to heal. With over 45 years of combined medical experience, our team of Naturopathic Doctors work to naturally bring you towards a place of health and well-being. The doctors at North Coast Naturopathic Medicine are licensed primary care providers who spend the time necessary with each patient to determine the underlying causes of illness and to individualize the treatments to the patient's needs. Take a look at our [FAQ page](/faq) if you have specific questions, or continue reading below for more information. Call Us Today at (707) 840-0556 Our doctors are unable to provide any specific treatments or recommendations until you are an established patient, but they are happy to answer questions concerning naturopathic medicine and how it can work
